overview: Recorded at the 2008 Glastonbury Symposium, Ian R Crane explains how the socio-psychopathic Global Corporatists use their pernicious technology to keep Humanity in Economic and Spiritual subjugation. However, Ian is convinced that Humanity WILL prevail and closes his presentation with a message of conviction and encouragement to the ever increasing number of people who are stepping out of the Matrix.
title: The War on Terra
